Room.Name: Lyanden Road/Gulley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a gulley which a stream of water has cut across the road.
Room.LongDescription: The stream flows from the Enchanted Forest on the north side and has cut the road on its way to the desert on the south side. Within a few meters, the water disappears into a great sinkhole in the desert floor. The stream swirls violently with a loud roar before going under the sand.
